sections.content: I keep this one on my bedstand. It's easily one of the prettiest candles I have, yellow and tall. It has one wick, it smells really sweet, and it has this bulbous glass lid. It sits next to a rainbow horse skeleton and balances the vibe.

The rest of these are in my bathroom. I like to turn one on when I shower.

This one smells like those pine cones that you get during wintertime, but a little warmer? It has a really nice orange color. I like this one occasionally but it's fairly strong even though it is one of my smaller candles.

This one is really subtle. Which makes me feel goofy saying, cause I don't see myself as a candle person tm but I don't know, it's still strong, but the scent is mild? You get what I mean? It smells like winter, and a little minty.

I love this one. It smells like peppermint hot chocolate. I burned half of it in one day and now I am saving it for later. If I were to ever want to be paid in a single commodity#apart from food it would be this candle. I want three more.
They had a sale for buy one get one 50% off. I'm dissapointed I didn't get two of peppermint hot chocolate. This one isn't bad but it's no peppermint hot chocolate.

I can't buy this anywhere anymore and the label is gone, and I've burned it too much so I can't burn it anymore. I do really like this one though and I'm still looking for a replacement. I keep it because it has such a nice green color and it reminds me that I liked it.

I met the person that made these candles! I bought one after meeting them, and this one was one of my favorite ones based off the description. It's super cute and has little crystals in it. I don't know how to describe how it smells. It smells like, glitter-water? Wild and wacky. It came with a bunch of goodies. Go get local candles.
I bought another one. It smells good though, like late fall trees and a fireplace. Fantastic.
THIS ONE HAS ACTUAL CARDAMOM IN IT. Another local candle maker. These are the best I really need to buy local more. Super good smell, cute lil jar it comes in, nice lil label, love it. Go get um.

sections.header: Does a first rain of the season candle exist?
sections.content: If it does I want one. That's my favorite smell. Apart from peppermint hot chocolate I guess.
